page.title: 13TRANSPORT(1).CALCOT,READING
page.content: Transport is very good in the Calcot area. Locally there are quite regular bus services running either directly into the town of Reading,or to Newbury in the other direction,or indirectly to those places via other areas and villages. Once in Reading there is an excellent train service which will enable one to travel to any part of the country.The train service running through Tilehurst station allows access to the Oxford/Paddington line. From Reading station one may take the special bus to Heathrow airport, from which one may catch a flight to any part of the world. The close proximity of the M4 motorway enables residents of Calcot and Tilehurst to travel easily and quickly to the East and West.
